body.text: A roaring flame leaps from the caster's hand, illuminating the battlefield.
A cresting wave surges forward, sweeping foes off their feet.
A sudden gust lifts dust and leaves, obscuring vision and forcing retreat.
The ground trembles as a stone fist erupts beneath the target.
A spiraling bolt of chaos dances unpredictably between enemies.
A focused arcane lance slices through magical defenses with precision.

trail.text: Scorched earth and flickering embers mark the spell's path.
A misty wake lingers, dampening sound and slowing pursuit.
Whispers ride the wind, bolstering allies' resolve.
Pebbles and dust swirl into a low barricade behind the caster.
Reality bends subtly, leaving behind echoes of alternate outcomes.
Runes shimmer in the air, amplifying nearby enchantments.

impact.text: A thunderous detonation sends flames spiraling skyward.
The spell culminates in a crystalline burst, encasing targets in frost.
A concussive blast knocks spellcasters off balance, disrupting incantations.
Stone fragments scatter, embedding into armor and terrain.
A ripple in space displaces enemies, scattering formations.
A radiant pulse restores clarity and focus to nearby allies.
